author: Your Name
install_msg: Toxic cog installed! Use `[p]help toxic` to see commands. Configure with `[p]toxic config view`.
name: Toxic
short: Vote-based kick/ban system with role matching.
description: Democratic voting system allowing server members to vote kick/ban others with matching roles. Configurable duration, thresholds, and safety features.
end_user_data_statement: Stores temporary vote data that is deleted when votes conclude.
